Package me.lihq.game.screen

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractScreen
    This is defines all the common methods and properties for each screen.
    InventoryScreen
    The screen that shows the user what clues they have collected.
    MainMenuScreen
    This controls the MainMenuScreen that is the first thing the user sees
    NavigationScreen
    This is the screen that is responsible for the navigation of the player around the game.
    NumberOfPlayersSelectionScreen
    Class that stores the screen for choosing how many players the game runs for in multi-player.
    PauseScreen
    This class shows the pause Screen and all its UI elements.
    PlayerSwitchScreen
    Class added by Lorem Ipsum
    PuzzleScreen
    This class shows the Puzzle to the player allowing them to complete it to gain access to the secret room
    ScreenManager
    ScreenManager handles the GUI screens within the game
    SettingsScreen
    The screen that allows the user to change the various settings of the game.
    WinScreen
    The screen that is displayed when the player wins the game.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Screens
    This class stores an enumeration of all the screen types
